 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשַׂק‎</span>] **verb Hithpa\`el** ==contend== (perhaps originally ***cling*** to (in strife), compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cling*** with love ([[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 143</sup>); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethpa\`al ***be difficult*** (i.e. ***indignant, hostile***); Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָסַק‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲסַק‎</span>, ***busy oneself***, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵסֶק‎</span> ***business, occupation***); — ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַשְּׂקוּ עִמּוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.26.20|Gen 26:20]] ***they contended with him***.
